result.title: http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/17/A (Wrong data set) || please comment
result.content:
problem link : http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/17/A

Hi All, I think the test data set #32 is wrong. I have tried several times and due to this data my submission was failing. According to me for Test #32 answer should be NO. but it is YES

Can someone please let me know if I am wrong or right?

Test: #31, time: 30 ms., memory: 4 KB, exit code: 0, checker exit code: 0, verdict: OK Input 1000 44 Output YES Answer YES Checker Log ok answer is YES

Test: #32, time: 30 ms., memory: 4 KB, exit code: 0, checker exit code: 0, verdict: OK Input 1000 0 Output YES Answer YES Checker Log ok answer is YES
